alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 10:46PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cochise County through 1145 PM MST... At 1045 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles northwest of Dragoon to near Hereford. Movement was west southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail and brief heavy rain that may lead to localized flooding issues. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sierra Vista, Benson, Hereford, Whetstone, Huachuca City, St. David, Tombstone, Kartchner Caverns State Park, Fort Huachuca, Palominas, Charleston, Fairbank and Coronado National Memorial. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 300 and 316. Route 80 between mile markers 293 and 317, and between mile markers 325 and 326. Route 82 between mile markers 52 and 67. Route 90 between mile markers 290 and 306, and between mile markers 315 and 335. Route 92 between mile markers 322 and 346. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
